function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Airborne transmission of SARS-CoV-2 through HVAC systems","Impact":"Increased spread of COVID-19 in indoor environments","Mitigation":"Regular maintenance and cleaning of HVAC systems, use of high-efficiency air filters, and installation of UVGI systems","Technologies":"High-efficiency air filters, UVGI systems","People":"Occupants of indoor environments, especially those in close proximity to HVAC systems","Owner":"Building management, HVAC maintenance personnel"},{"Description":"Uncertainty regarding the transmission of infection through air circulation","Impact":"Lack of clear guidance and standards for mitigating airborne transmission","Mitigation":"Research and guidelines development on the transmission of infection through air circulation, implementation of proper ventilation and air purification strategies","Technologies":"Research, guidelines development, proper ventilation systems, air purification technologies","People":"Scientists, public health authorities, building management","Owner":"Scientific research organizations, public health authorities, building management"},{"Description":"Inconsistency in virus survival due to environmental factors","Impact":"Unpredictability in controlling the spread of infection in indoor environments","Mitigation":"Monitoring and regulation of environmental factors, implementation of air quality control measures, and education on the impact of environmental factors on virus survival","Technologies":"Environmental monitoring systems, air quality control measures","People":"Occupants of indoor environments, scientific community","Owner":"Building management, scientific research organizations"}]}
